meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with tall spikes of blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The delphinium in the garden swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of delphiniums to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns in the delphinium petals.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a field of delphiniums, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The delicate delphiniums danced gracefully under the summer sun.
